tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AnimalMovements (
    animal_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50),
    from_location VARCHAR(100),
    to_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Animal (
    animal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    facility_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES Facility(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Movement (
    movement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    movement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (animal_id) REFERENCES Animal(animal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Animal (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
species TEXT,
age INT,
location TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Facility (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
location TEXT,
capacity INT);

CREATE TABLE Movement (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
animal_id INT,
from_location TEXT,
to_location TEXT,
movement_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Staff (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
role TEXT,
contact TEXT);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringLog (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
log_type TEXT,
log_description TEXT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);
